attributes.action: Stop the price increase for a parking permit Glasgow.
attributes.background: Parking permits are to rise in cost from £50 to £85 per year from 20/08/2018. Stated by a Glasgow city council sign on a pole in the street!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
The Glasgow City Council has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the council here:

https://www.glasgow.gov.uk/index.aspx?articleid=17716
